Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Here we go... and here... Alright, think we can call it a day here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "We're done for the day. We can start with paving tomorrow, and hopefully we'll be done with reconstructing the area by the end of this month.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you, Karenina.', 3: '7'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Nah. We're glad to have you here to help when you're supposed to be off duty.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Although I never really asked you for help in the first place...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Couldn't help but notice how busy you were.", 3: '11'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'And do you see what your kindness always gets you?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "W-well, I mean... You see, all I'm trying to say is it never hurts to be a little nicer to yourself. Never mind.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Well, nothing beats hanging out after a good day's of work, I suppose?", 3: '18'}
{2: 'Some mechanoid started a drink bar down at Main.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'And apparently they started selling drinks to Constructs, too. Wanna give it a try?', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Their drinks always come with a gasoline smell, though...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Don't get me wrongâ€”I do want to go, but I'm afraid I'll have to take a rain check today because I have a meeting to catch at WGAA.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A meeting, you said?'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Remember how they're trying to rebuild Constellia? I just hope they can actually spend some time going over basic math and structural mechanics before coming up with whatever plans they have...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "A meeting with them usually lasts for two to three hours, but I've grown used to that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'My job is to make their needs realistically achievable, and turn those realistically achievable needs into humanly acceptable tasks for my people to work on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds like a handful.', 3: '30'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's the life of a captain for ya.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'And talking to them isn\'t always a waste of time. How does that saying go again? "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder." Engineering is beautiful in its own way, and I pick up useful knowledge here and there every now and then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Count me in, then.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Uh, what? I mean, I could totally do that, but...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I'm in frequent contact with WGAA, so it's all good.", 3: '38'}
{2: 'We just might be able to hang out somewhere if we get the meeting over with fast enough.', 3: '40'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Well... as far as efficiency goes, you do have a point there...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "You've never taken a good look at the area you rebuilt, have you?", 3: '44'}
{2: 'Which makes it a perfect chance for you to reexamine it and judge it from an aesthetic perspective, no?', 3: '45'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Alright, alright. Point taken. Let's stop with the persuasion here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I haven't taken a good look at the city since I came down to Earth this time, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "And never have I imagined I'd be doing that with you... Uh-hum, 'nuff said.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Anyhow, let's get going, shall we?", 4: '1'}
